For example, those of the Aryan Root Race affiliated with the Hibiru Cloister, who carry the gene code imprint for the white skinned races, have within their seven sub-races a white skinned sub-race with a dom- inant Aryan or Hibiru Cloister gene, a black skinned sub-race with a domi- nant Euanjhechi or Yunaseti Cloister gene, a yellow skinned sub-race with a dominant Muvarian or Melchizedek Cloister gene, a brown skinned sub-race with a dominant Lemurian or Ur-Antrian gene, and a red skinned sub-race with a dominant Atlantean or Breanoua Cloister gene. There will also be two additional sub-races which bear the primary skin color of their Root Race and Cloister, who carry a dominant gene from the First Polarian and Second Hyperbornean Root Races of Gaia. Each of the primary Root Races and their Cloisters have this inter-mixed sub-racial division. The seven sub-families 84
